title: Trump, Netanyahu to meet at Mar-a-Lago. Watch live.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is set to meet with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu at Mar-a-Lago. Watch live.

title: Did Trump sign a 'Home Gym Deduction Act?' No, post is not true.
shortDescription: Social media posts claim President Donald Trump just signed a bill that would allow for home gyms to be tax deductible. They are false.

title: Trump says US 'knocked out' facility, but no Venezuela strike confirmed
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the U.S. "knocked out" a "big facility." Rumors of a U.S. strike on Venezuela haven't been confirmed.

title: Trump and Zelenskyy work on peace plan to end the war in Ukraine
shortDescription: Trump invited Zelensky to his private club to work on the U.S.-proposed peace plan to end the war in Ukraine as the conflict approaches four years.

title: Pelosi predicts Dems will take House in 2026 midterms
shortDescription: In an interview with ABC News, Pelosi also said that the person responsible for Donald Trump's impeachments was Trump.

title: Trump meets Zelenskyy for Ukraine peace talks
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he believes a peace deal for Ukraine is coming together as he welcomed the nation's leader Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

title: Trump says 'thorny' issues remain after peace talks with Zelenskyy
shortDescription: "It’s very close," Trump said of the peace deal, acknowledging that negotiations might not produce results. "It’s possible it doesn’t happen."

title: Zelenskyy to meet Trump in Florida for Ukraine peace talks: What to know
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and U.S. President Donald Trump will meet in Florida to hammer out a plan to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Where anti-Mamdani voters go next as NYC mayor takes office
shortDescription: Some are protesting to support Israel. Others want to help moderate Democrats in the midterms.

title: Russia drones Ukraine before Trump-Zelenskyy talks
shortDescription: Russia attacked Ukraine with hundreds of missiles and drones ahead of peace talks between President Trump and Ukrainian President Zelenskyy.

title: Ukraine attacked by hundreds of drones before Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
shortDescription: Russia attacked Ukraine with hundreds of drones ahead of talks between Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and U.S. President Donald Trump.

title: Six key challenges facing President Trump in 2026
shortDescription: With the new year's arrival, Trump must navigate lingering impasses over spending and health care.

title: Donald Trump urges DOJ to 'embarrass' any Democrats in Epstein files
shortDescription: “The Dems are the ones who worked with Epstein," Trump said in a Dec. 26 social media post. “Release all of their names, embarrass them.”

title: White House Press Secretary Leavitt expecting baby girl
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt announced that she's having a baby girl, calling it "the greatest Christmas gift we could ever ask for."

title: What's behind Trump's Nigeria strikes?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he ordered military strikes against "ISIS terrorist scum" in Nigeria on Christmas Day.

title: Zelenskyy says he's meeting with Trump over Ukraine peace deal
shortDescription: The Ukrainian president said "a lot can be decided before the New Year." Trump told Politico that Zelenskyy "doesn’t have anything until I approve it.”

title: US forces hit Islamic State militants in Nigeria after Trump warnings
shortDescription: President Trump said "numerous perfect strikes" had hit Islamic State militants in the West African nation of Nigeria.

title: Trump rings in Christmas with a sack full of social media posts
shortDescription: Trump heralded Christmas with messages criticizing 'Radical Left Scum' and promoting the country's economic growth.
